channel.title: Need help with fr33sc4p3 pkz
channel.description:
I need help. people are pking at meetings, and i heard there was a command to stop everyone from pking, and make everywhere a safezone. Please tell me if there is such a command, and if there is, tell me what to type in. Also, i need to know how to raise item's stats. Such as..i would make a bronze dagger be a 1hit weapon. Well i wanna make an iban staff a 1hit weapon,and i would like to know how to do so.
Thanks.
